website_summaries.verdict: This desk is definitely worth the price if you are going for a more professional, expensive look.
pros: Constructed of gorgeous, dark brown solid wood, exudes elegance and fine craftsmanship from every angle
cons: If you're not looking to pay a premium for elegance, this may not be the desk for you

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fxcking Desk!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome solid wood desk; no particle board, and I can smell the wood from down the hallway after the first night. The desk arrived in two crates weighing 400lbs total. Mostly pre-assembled (4 pieces), 18 screws hold everything together. Looks and feels better than desks costing several times as much, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Barely.Broke

customer_reviews.title: have help. it comes on a pallet.
customer_reviews.text: love the desk. one spot was scratched but not the top. it's easy to assemble. need two people to set the top.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat It for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I was very reluctant to buy this desk since it is made in China. However, the price and other reviews pulled me in. I am very pleased with the overall quality of this gigantic desk. A similar desk bought in a furniture store would be out of reach for me cost-wise. There are just a few minor manufacturing flaws that I can point out, such as some of the knobs are just a bit crooked and you can tell there is a lot of wood putty here and there. But overall, people (including myself) are always impressed when they walk into my home-office and see this beast.
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Professional Look
customer_reviews.text: So many compliments. VERY heavy and solid wood - even the drawers and doors. Little to no assembly required. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KarinK

customer_reviews.title: Luxury at its peak. Excellent desk at an discounted price.
customer_reviews.text: This item was grossly delayed delayed by more than 2 weeks; something that has never happened to me from amazon.com. However I must say that it worths every penny. Well made and looks magnificent. After installing it, I chased my frustration for the delay away. Thanks Coaster furniture for a great product. My home office looks like a million dollar office. Amazon emailed me and notified me for the delay and rendered an apology.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL DESK...MAJOR CORNER FLAWS (ALL 4)
customer_reviews.text: A gorgeous desk. Love it. Took a long time to ship and receive however. These flaws were in all 4 corners. Pictures taken right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Shaw

customer_reviews.title: To buy such big furniture online is not good idea since after unpack everything to figure out what ...
customer_reviews.text: The desk actually is not all hard wood. Only the top and drawer are. Other places are engineer wood. It is surprise me since i thought such cost should be all hard wood. To buy such big furniture online is not good idea since after unpack everything to figure out what you bought, it's hard to return since all the mess at home. And replace or return you have to put all the things back as original packet. I won't suggest or recommend to buy furniture online even the pictures looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow... I am impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this desk... I am impressed with the quality. It looks really, really good!!!! A lot of drawers and space, very easy to put together and heavy! It shipped the next day, came with no scratches or marks at all. I would buy again in a heart beat. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_User

customer_reviews.title: Elegant desk
customer_reviews.text: What can i say - Elegance is the key word. If you are searching for an sosphicated & well crafted desk - than look no further. The desk screams LUXURY! However, the desk is a more darker wood than the shown picture. Other than that, i love the desk. By the way- you will need a minimum of 2 very strong individuals to assemble the desk. It's pure wood & extremely heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Precious01

customer_reviews.title: Look over product before delivery bring into your home
customer_reviews.text: Good desk, but darker color then advertisement and some scratches and damage with finish would return but bigger problem to do since so big and willing to live with damage then go through return.
customer_reviews.author: Good

customer_reviews.title: Loved the desk
customer_reviews.text: Loved the desk, it ie exactly like the picture. Did not like the company that was chosen to ship my items. They dumped in the middle of my driveway while I was not home. There was some damage but the desk in usable and it looks beautiful in my office. I would recommend the desk but verify shipping company before ordering to ensure proper delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Too many defects
customer_reviews.text: One drawer face plate broken, one pedestal panel broken, large duvet top of desk, one inch area chipped off front of desk
customer_reviews.author: usha s.

customer_reviews.title: Elegance at a significant bargain
customer_reviews.text: I opted for the white glove delivery with assembly. This desk is phenomenal and was placed exactly where I wanted. Thus far no defects have been noted. I will update in 6 months with follow up review.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S

customer_reviews.title: Very nice - but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Based upon the other reviews I read prior to my purchase this desk met my expectations. For the money I don't think you can beat it. The packaging is among the best I have seen, and the desk arrived in perfect condition. This is VERY HEAVY furniture, so make sure you have a large friend or partner to help set it up. Fortunately the delivery guy was very kind and willing to help me carry it into my office. Overall I am very pleased with the desk and the delivery process.
customer_reviews.author: Matzart

customer_reviews.title: The search is over
customer_reviews.text: Searched for an executive desk for over a year and I finally found it! It was easy to assemble, craftsmanship is amazing and is the talk when people step into my office.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin Grondel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the Desk... Company's Shipping and Delivery Method SUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: Love the desk, it was everything I wanted in a desk. Delivery needs major improvement as it is "curb side" and weighs over 400 lbs. I need my son and two of his friends to wait at my home for the delivery to bring it into the house. Being that it was a rainy miserable day, there was no way to just "leave it" outside. I tried to contact the company but had no number and only email responses which did little as they did not change their method of shipping/delivery. Let me reiterate that I love the desk... But the shipping and delivery sucked.
customer_reviews.author: Reety

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Desk
customer_reviews.text: Very nervous about ordering a piece of furniture offline. It is a really nice well made desk. There were not nicks or scratches and was packaged very well for shipping...
customer_reviews.author: Lee M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but....
customer_reviews.text: The desk is beautiful. I thought there were 2 file drawers but there is 1 file drawer and a cabinet. the cabinet's magnet alignment is off as the cabinet does not stay close.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Porter

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the product because it came in damaged on a couple corners.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I don't give it 5 Stars is due to the drawer set up. It was designed for a hard drive but not very practical for anything else. I love the desk though and it looks fantastic in the home office. It's bigger than it looks in the picture and make sure you have plenty of help. It is incredibly heavy and comes in 3 pieces. They took it off the truck at my house on a pallet with a fork lift. I have seen this exact desk online for as much as $3000. I bought it on Amazon for less than $1300. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product at half the cost of any comparable desk ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product at half the cost of any comparable desk of this quality. No problem. Exactly what I needed, and delivered in an incredibly short time.
customer_reviews.author: James T Noles

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk poor delivery
customer_reviews.text: I like the desk very nice looks great. Only problem was in delivery they did not show up on day schedule and I had to call four times before I could find out why.
customer_reviews.author: Ed V.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful desk! It is very solid and well built with lovely detailed carvings on the edge. I would definitely underline the executive part when describing this desk. It is a bit darker than the picture shows but that was great for us because it went well with the dark cherry bookshelves we already had in the office. You will need two strong people to move it top piece and place it on the pedestals, otherwise the other pieces are manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholle

customer_reviews.title: I love my desk!
customer_reviews.text: It came with minor damage. The damage was not caused in transit because this thing was packed in a manner that damage is almost impossible. As a matter of fact I have never seen an item packaged so well in my life! Amazon reimbursed me the difference for the damage. The desk is beautiful; however, the colors are not quite as rich as represented in the picture. Mine is much darker, but it still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: A very large and handsome desk!
customer_reviews.text: A very large and handsome desk! The color of the desk I received was much darker than that in the photo. You will need 2-3 people for assembly as the desk top is over 100# itself.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We own a few if these at our corporate office top quality and look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it - Looks great
customer_reviews.text: The desk looks great. It is made from all wood. The finish is clean, however there are some minor scratches. The only downside is that this thing is very heavy and would require 2-3 people to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Fadedcloud

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy, Very Classy!
customer_reviews.text: This desk surpassed all my expectations. Locally the desks in this price range were plain jane, to get something similar I would have to spend double the price. The only issue I would have is that the color in the picture shows it a lighter shade than what actually showed up. I have no issue with the color however if you are looking for something mid-dark brown this would be closer to a black shade. I am not sure if it will lighten up after some time. This beast is heavy, you will need 2-3 people to set up.
customer_reviews.author: UKmts

customer_reviews.title: Other than that I am pleased with the product and service
customer_reviews.text: It is a elegant looking table and it comes as a single package. Some assembly required. There was some damage on the corner. Other than that I am pleased with the product and service.
customer_reviews.author: Swapna Anthoor

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The seller did a great job on packaging the desk for delivery. The desk was received in flawless condition. As stated in other reviews, do not underestimate the size and weight of the desk. It is heavy and requires 2-3 people for assembly. The desk is as described in its description with many features. The only downside to this desk is it scratches easily. Overall, it is a great desk that compliments my home.
customer_reviews.author: Geno

customer_reviews.title: Executive Desk
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband. Delivery was horrible, they dropped it in my front yard and broke the pallet and left behind a horrible mess to try and move the crate. The desk is beautiful. Waiting on my husbands office to be completed to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This desk is gorgeous and I love working from my new desk. Worth the money. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: sage

customer_reviews.title: Excellent craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: The picture doesn't do this desk justice. Solid. Excellent craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING DESK NONE BETTER!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This desk is amazing and came in Mint condition I couldn't be happier, everyone who sees it complements it and it is a real piece of art I've never seen anything like in person before.
customer_reviews.author: KorthMonster

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: This desk is heavy and can take a few minutes to assemble, but it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy and everyone sees it or sits in it are very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Namkorvet1

customer_reviews.title: very happy with the desk
customer_reviews.text: good value for the dollar well packaged arrived promptly - very little assembly work needed and easy to do- i wished it had came with scratch pen.but very happy
customer_reviews.author: gregory matatall

customer_reviews.title: Many defects
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this desk for my father and the top piece had a lot of issues. The top leather piece was uneven and sunken in on one side. The drawer right below also skids along the upper part of the opening, kind of dragging wood-on-wood, creating scratches. It's not easy to open. Looking below, underneath the desk, we see some screws missing and pieces unevenly placed in. There are also scratches on the side. Overall, I wished my father came home in time to have assembled it earlier and noticed all the defects and how it was poorly made. We would like to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Kho

customer_reviews.title: Did get banged up a litlle in transportation, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Did get banged up a litlle in transportation, but I was able to glue it together. Some of the decals came off. The company was not willing to repair!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Olson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome desk
customer_reviews.text: The desk is darker than the picture but very elegant looking. It's a heavy piece of furniture and well built. Now that I've seen the quality , I'm going to order the bookcase to finish off the home office.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was beautiful and It attracts a lot of attention because it's so nice looking desk.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Amidan

customer_reviews.title: luv it but its VERY VERY HEAVY - some 400 lbs I think.
customer_reviews.text: luv it but its VERY VERY HEAVY - some 400 lbs I think.
customer_reviews.author: Redychal

customer_reviews.title: Yes this was have but so easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Yes this was have but so easy to put together. My husband and I did it by ourselves and all I did was kneel under the desk and used my back to help lift the desk up and align it. It looks so good too and with the matching file cabinet
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: you will not beat this price. the desk is really great. highly recommend to anyone that wants an elegant desk.
customer_reviews.author: Clint H.

customer_reviews.title: This desk is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My husband works with building plans that are several pages. We needed a very large desk. Great size. Very well made heavy piece. Very classy style. Wonderful price & fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Gina G. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: the top is Extremely beutiful and REAL Solid Wood,not particle board,could not believe how heavy it was highly recomend AAA
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing furniture i love it!!! The Material wood very elegant 😍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, Perfect. Would highly recommend to anyone that wants a high quality office desk. You will not be disappointed. Caution! Very Very Heavy. Solid.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Lazoff

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality for the price. The service should be better on customer's interests. It took long time for the item to get to my house.
customer_reviews.author: Wanrong Yin

customer_reviews.title: nice furniture!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, nice furniture!!! Packaged very very well!! Beautiful furniture! It arrived quickly too! Couldn't be more pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: Freddie Newby

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected..
customer_reviews.text: Again I am very disappointed that it is not made in these great United States of America.. I guess we are just too greedy to come up with clever ways to build here. Very nice desk with lots of hidden items built in.. very smart indeed.
customer_reviews.author: TLG&me

customer_reviews.title: very elegant
customer_reviews.text: Looks very elegant, especially for the price. It competes with other desks that are 3x the cost in retail stores. If you are looking for traditional desk, this could be a good option.
customer_reviews.author: VamC

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful. Everything fit together without a hitch
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. Everything fit together without a hitch. Could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Young

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Very formal and sets a strong elegant presence. Well packaged but very heavy must have 2 strong adults to move.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Cook

customer_reviews.title: The best purchase I have made in a while!  LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk! It's heavy but strong and sturdy. Beautiful details...I looked a long time for the perfect desk and this by far is the best I have found for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Price

customer_reviews.title: better than expected desk!
customer_reviews.text: This is a big bold heavy wooden desk...shows the quality right away. We built it pretty easily but all the pieces can be heavy to move, a 2 person job for sure. Finish was perfect, it didnt smell like some chinese furniture can. Really competes against other desks that were twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Having a studious feeling is important when devising strategies to save to world. This desk suits my needs well. Comes with a control box/surge protector and hides all wires well!
customer_reviews.author: Medlc32

customer_reviews.title: NIce and Heavy
customer_reviews.text: A very heavy desk. Be prepared to have an extra set of hands... or two. Very nice details on the edging.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L

product_meta.title: Tucker Double Pedestal Executive Desk with Leather Insert Top Rich Brown
product_meta.description: Seat yourself behind this magnificent executive desk to promote powerful productivity. Expertly crafted, this desk exudes glamour, class, and taste. Ample storage and useful wire management give it extra versatile convenience. Its warm, rich brown finish is accentuated by intricate carvings and fluted details, giving it an opulent look. Reminiscent of a classic corner office, this desk boasts an exquisitely elegant aesthetic.
feature_bullets: Materials: Poplar wood, Cherry wood, MDF and Plywood
Hardware type: Metal knob and bail handle
Drawer glide type: Full extension glide
Drawer-felt lined: Yes, top drawer only
5 drawers (include keyboard drawer and file cabinet) and 1 CPU with adjustable shelves
Drawer construction: Top drawer front - French dovetail and back - English dovetails; drawer of base: English dovetails

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars95 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
